name: Get a single user
description: Note: The returned email is the user's publicly visible email address (or `null` if the user has not [specified a public email address in their profile](https://github.com/settings/profile)). The publicly visible email address only displays for authenticated API users.

name: Get the authenticated user
description:
Lists public and private profile information when authenticated through basic auth or OAuth with the `user` scope.

Lists public profile information when authenticated through OAuth without the `user` scope.

name: Update the authenticated user

params.name: name
params.description: The new name of the user.

params.name: email
params.description: The publicly visible email address of the user.

params.name: blog
params.description: The new blog URL of the user.

params.name: company
params.description: The new company of the user.

params.name: location
params.description: The new location of the user.

params.name: hireable
params.description: The new hiring availability of the user.

params.name: bio
params.description: The new short biography of the user.

description: **Note:** If your email is set to private and you send an `email` parameter as part of this request to update your profile, your privacy settings are still enforced: the email address will not be displayed on your public profile or via the API.

name: Get all users

params.name: since
params.description: The integer ID of the last User that you've seen.

description:
Lists all users, in the order that they signed up on GitHub. This list includes personal user accounts and organization accounts.

Note: Pagination is powered exclusively by the `since` parameter. Use the [Link header](/v3/#link-header) to get the URL for the next page of users.
